description: Number of partitions of n into parts not of the form 9k, 9k+4 or 9k-4. Also number of partitions with at most 3 parts of size 1 and differences between parts at distance 3 are greater than 1.
references: G. E. Andrews, The Theory of Partitions, Addison-Wesley, 1976, p. 109.
mathematica: nmax = 60; Rest[CoefficientList[Series[Product[1 / ((1 - x^(9*k-1)) * (1 - x^(9*k-2)) * (1 - x^(9*k-3)) * (1 - x^(9*k-6)) * (1 - x^(9*k-7)) * (1 - x^(9*k-8)) ), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 12 2015 *)
author: _Olivier GÃ©rard_
